title: Keycloak OpenID Authentication with WildFly
content: Keycloak is an open-source identity and access management solution that supports OpenID Connect and OAuth 2.0 protocols. In this tutorial we will learn how to configure a Keycloak Realm and use as OpenID Client an application running on WildFly. Before we get started, we need to learn some terms we will use in this article: ...  The post appeared first on .
